alert.note: Alert for Florence; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 2:07PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Florence and Williamsburg Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 207 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trio, or 8 miles southeast of Kingstree, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Kingstree, Johnsonville, Hemingway, Trio, Warsaw, Salters, Hannah, Cades, Nesmith, Indiantown, Gourdin, Earle, Morrisville, Henry, Scranton, Lane, Stuckey, Lake City Community Hospital and Williamsburg Regional Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
